/usr/bin/c++  -O3 -msse2 -msse3 -Wall -std=c++11  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/GPUTest.dir/GPUTest.cpp.o  -o GPUTest  -Wl,-rpath,/home/zyf-lab/code_and_data/code/ElastcFusion_Realsense_Camera/GPUTest/src/../../Core/build:/usr/local/lib /home/zyf-lab/code_and_data/code/ElastcFusion_Realsense_Camera/GPUTest/src/../../Core/build/libefusion.so /usr/local/lib/libpangolin.so /usr/local/cuda-11.1/lib64/libcudart_static.a -ldl -lrt -lrt -lpthread -lOpenGL -lGLX -lGLU -lGLEW -lEGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lrt -lpthread -lOpenGL -lGLX -lGLU -lGLEW -lEGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -ldc1394 -lavcodec -lavformat -lavutil -lswscale -lavdevice -lrealsense2 -lOpenNI2 /usr/local/lib/libuvc.so -lpng -lz -ljpeg -ltiff -lIlmImf -lpthread
